languages.text: "Хорошо. Хорошо..." {n}Старик нервно облизывает губы.{/n} "Только позвольте нам попрощаться как подобает".

traits.locale_text: "Хорошо. Хорошо..." {n}Старик нервно облизывает губы.{/n} "Только позвольте нам попрощаться как подабает".

languages.text: "Good. That is good..." {n}The old man nervously licks his lips.{/n} "But do allow us to say our proper farewells."
languages.original_text: "Хорошо. Хорошо..." {n}Старик нервно облизывает губы.{/n} "Только позвольте нам попрощаться как подобает".

traits.locale_text: "Good. That is good..." {n}The old man nervously licks his lips.{/n} "But do allow us to say our proper farewells."
"Good. That is good..." {n}The old man nervously licks his lips.{/n} "But do allow us to say our proper farewells."
"Good. That is good..." {n}The old man nervously licks his lips.{/n} "But do allow us to say our proper farewells."
"Good. That is good..." {n}The old man nervously licks his lips.{/n} "But do allow us to say our proper farewells."

languages.text: “好，太好了……”{n}老人紧张地舔着嘴唇。{/n}“不过，请允许我们进行合适的告别。”
languages.original_text: "Good. That is good..." {n}The old man nervously licks his lips.{/n} "But do allow us to say our proper farewells."

traits.locale_text: “好，太好了……”{n}老人紧张地舔着嘴唇。{/n}“不过，请允许我们进行合适的告别。”

languages.text: «Bien. Eso es bueno...». {n}El anciano se relame, nervioso.{/n} «Pero deje que nos despidamos como es debido».
languages.original_text: "Good. That is good..." {n}The old man nervously licks his lips.{/n} "But do allow us to say our proper farewells."

traits.locale_text: «Bien. Eso es bueno...». {n}El anciano se relame, nervioso.{/n} «Pero deje que nos despidamos como es debido».

languages.text: 「良かった。それは良かった…」{n}老人は神経質に唇をなめる。{/n}「だが、別れを告げることを赦し給え」
languages.original_text: "Good. That is good..." {n}The old man nervously licks his lips.{/n} "But do allow us to say our proper farewells."

traits.locale_text: 「良かった。それは良かった…」{n}老人は神経質に唇をなめる。{/n}「だが、別れを告げることを赦し給え」

languages.text: "Gut. Das ist gut ..." {n}Der alte Mann leckt sich nervös die Lippen.{/n} "Aber gestattet uns noch, uns ordentlich zu verabschieden."
languages.original_text: "Good. That is good..." {n}The old man nervously licks his lips.{/n} "But do allow us to say our proper farewells."

traits.locale_text: "Gut. Das ist gut ..." {n}Der alte Mann leckt sich nervös die Lippen.{/n} "Aber gestattet uns noch, uns ordentlich zu verabschieden."

languages.text: « Bien. C'est une bonne chose, {n}dit le vieil homme en se léchant les lèvres nerveusement.{/n} Je vous demanderai simplement de nous laisser le temps de nous dire adieu. »
languages.original_text: "Good. That is good..." {n}The old man nervously licks his lips.{/n} "But do allow us to say our proper farewells."

traits.locale_text: « Bien. C'est une bonne chose, {n}dit le vieil homme en se léchant les lèvres nerveusement.{/n} Je vous demanderai simplement de nous laisser le temps de nous dire adieu. »

languages.text: "Güzel. Böylesi daha iyi." {n}İhtiyar adam, gergince dudaklarını yalıyor.{/n} "Lütfen uygun şekilde veda etmemize müsaade et."
languages.original_text: "Good. That is good..." {n}The old man nervously licks his lips.{/n} "But do allow us to say our proper farewells."

traits.locale_text: "Güzel. Böylesi daha iyi." {n}İhtiyar adam, gergince dudaklarını yalıyor.{/n} "Lütfen uygun şekilde veda etmemize müsaade et."
